p: The sample of Amphiora rigida J.V. Lamouroux was collected in the middle part of the Adriatic Sea coast, close to Zadar (Šepurine), in September 2020 (44°12′42″ N; 15°09′23″ E). Single point sample collection provided representative sample. The alga was collected from depths of 2 m with a sea temperature at 20 °C. The samples were collected and placed in air tight plastic bags containing surrounding seawater and were immediately transported to the laboratory.
